Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Come in only during the nights but a great place for convenience. Decent prices on beverages/drinks :). Oh and the gentleman (Elijah i believe) is very nice and always seems to be busy keeping the inside of the store looking great, as well as his coworker i believe.  good store to have around the corner :D

Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Sales guy Jeremy done a great job on going over the different wash packages with me! The young black kid who done the cleaning done a very bad job and I got a premium wash package and he didn't even wipe all of the truck off! Then I go to the interior after he gave me my keys for a second time and told me it was ready and they didn't even vacuum off the seats I got to say definitely won't be back here for a car wash and I left my truck there for an hour and a half while I was at the gym I figured it would be convenient while I worked out but I guess not!! Again Jeremy who wrote up the ticket done a great job and I understand he can't control what the other guys do

Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: Convenient location at Stephanie and 215, this place usually has decent prices for gas. They accept Vons card for gas rewards. There is a great car wash with meticulous employees, although the prices aren't the best around. Get a car wash punchcard if you plan on coming here often. There's a good size waiting area inside. The store is spacious, clean and has anything you might need on a quick stop. I take one star off because I've had issues with the pumps malfunctioning while pumping gas.

Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: They were efficient in the way the workers arranged the cars as each car got its turn to get the once over. But so many basics were ignored on my small pickup that I cannot recommend this place for a car wash.   They did not clean the bed part of my pickup, they did not clean the interior windows or the windshield, and they neglected to clean underneath the seats. My truck is one of those work trucks that has plastic floors so it's pretty easy to clean.   In fact, I figured out how easy it was to clean because I ended up finishing the job for these people.  Next time I will save the $18.99 plus tip and do this myself.

Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The service here is pathetic. I've been coming here since this car wash opened probably a decade ago. I don't know if ownership or management changed, but I had a problem and the manager refused to come out of her office to talk to me. The staff said the mgr wants me to call corporate.

Reviews.Author: Shar
Reviews.Content: I am so disappointed in this place. I wanted a quick car wash as I had my 1 year old daughter with me, the guy at the beginning of car wash pressured me into a full detail because of the deals. I told him I didn't care about what was included in the cost and I just wanted a  quick  clean because I didn't have time to spend because of my baby. He said he was a dad, he understood, he would rush my car and it would be done in half an hour - 45 minutes tops. So I spend $60 and one hour and 45 minutes later with a cranky, hungry toddler in tow my car is  done . I just wanted to get out of there and with the amount of time I spent I figured they cleaned it very well. Well now I'm home and those kids that do car washes for fundraising could have done a better job for $5. The bottom of my car is still muddy, they did not even touch my gear shift where there is still dirt and my dash is dusty! My rear window has a hand smudge mark and I swear there's a new ding on my passenger side door. If you guys think they do a good job you've obviously never had your car done anywhere else. I will never go back here again and will drive an extra 20 minutes to Oasis at the Shell on Pecos and Flamingo. For 1/3rd of the cost you get quality service from people who pay attention to detail.

Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: Their car wash service is the biggest scam I have seen in a long time! Their classic wash will cost you $14.99 and it is exterior wash only. You throw in another $5 for a glorified exterior wash (tire dressing added!) which is called ultra! I had some stains inside the doors and asked them to clean, learning that I would have to upgrade to the Hand-wash (VIC)! And that would cost me $49.99. The supreme wash which is only $27.99 cannot buy you wiping the plastic parts with wet towel. I had an argument with the field supervisor back and forth and couldn't wrap my brain around why they wouldn't just wipe the door interrupts! The guy basically told me that his guys were trained to just lightly dust the plastic parts and dash for even $27.99 and I would have to pay $50 for that service. I am actually impressed how blunt they are about the scam; it takes guts to openly tell people that you will be ripping them for something so basic. Anyways, I deserve this because I am so lazy! I should just clean my car inside my garage and watch these business go bankrupt, as they just deserve that! Think about this place; how much you are paying and what you are getting in return.  My two cents!

Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Stopped in for an overdue car wash. Friendly service from the moment you pull up until you get you keys back. They have three options of washes and all are reasonably priced.mi went with the Ultra( middle one) and it included interior and exterior with the tires being detailed as well. Almost everything was good, except my front and rear windows. Didn't see when first left but in the correct sunlight/ shade it really showed. Other than that the car was in great condition and looking sharp.

Reviews.Author: Beatle
Reviews.Content: Wow, this place seemed all out of shits to give today. I've been coming here regularly for years just for the car wash. It used to be better. The guys who receive and vacuum your vehicle were nice and they did a good job. No complaints there. They upsold me on a  wax special  of another $15 to  hand wax  my truck. Voice inside my head counseled no, but I agreed.  The cashier Bobbie(Robbie maybe? Older white lady) was rude and made sure to cough a phlegmy lungful into EACH HAND INDIVIDUALLY before giving me my change. Gross.  Waiting area was filthy, but someone did come clean it while I was sitting there. I was in and out in about 45 minutes which wasn't bad, but the wax was a waste of money. I have to agree with recent reviewers that this place has gone downhill. They were better off when they had a large Hispanic workforce and now it's a bunch of lazy, white teenagers. I was irritated just watching these lethargic chubsters slowly meander around my truck.  I said to the kid that I didn't notice any difference with or without the wax. He just laughed and said nothing. I walked around and then handed him a $5, which I always do. He took it, said nothing, and walked off. They got wax on my windows and missed a lot on the interior. I opened my passenger door and still had mud right there on the step where you get in. Come on guys! With the  wax , it ran almost $35, plus $5 tip.  I used to like this place and I'll say the vacuum guys still do a good job, but it may be time to find a new car wash. SKIP THE WAX!!!

Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I have found this car wash to be a suitable replacement after Lakeside Carwash closed.  They are pretty quick and do a nice job.  They have a comfortable waiting area, and if you want you can buy food in their mini mart.  Be sure to get their  Pit Stop Card  to earn free washes.

Reviews.Author: Lys
Reviews.Content: HORRIBLE SERVICE!!!!   I bought the most expensive car wash thinking they would actually Do what the y claim comes with that package.   When I got my car back, all the stains and dirt on the doors and leather on the backseat, were still there. I had to ask the guy to borrow his sponge to wipe them off!!!! The cup holder was never vacuumed. And  the inside of the back window, was never touched. All the streaks are still there! Don't waste your time and money at this place. Those teenagers are too busy chatting and doing a crappy job.  You are better off going to the $5 car wash and get better results for what they do.

Reviews.Author: Sirena
Reviews.Content: They only have one star because I have to give them a star or it won't let me write the review. I wish I read the reviews. I'll never go again and will be getting a refund. I was there today. My car was busy for nearly 4 hours, yes I went to lunch but I saw it being parked before in the sun before having a dessert across the street. I paid 74.99 before tax for a detailing: to have the seats and carpet vaccumed and shampooed and all the plastics and vinyl's detailed.  It was disgusting. They didn't move the seats to vacuum. It was not vacuumed well before it was washed...and guess what? I took it through a quick terrible's wash before I came, half their job was done for them. And yet there is still debris on my carpet. There is still dirt in the cracks. There are still liquid marks on the vinyl. I could have done a better job at a coin operated self-wash in half the time. There were red paint streaks on my back right bumper. No damage thankfully, but they either ran into my car or backed it into something. They didn't vacuum the weather stripping. This is disgusting. I am embarrassed and ashamed for them.

Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend the car wash!  They are great.   Fast and courteous and prices are reasonable.  I bring all my vehicles to get washed here.

Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Although this is not close to my house, I come here because it's really close to where I volunteer at the Ron Paul HQ.   They have a pretty huge selection of goodies in various sizes - Good.  Lots of Mexican versions of pop (Coke, Sprite, etc) which my family is obsessed with. Problem is, they're not very cold because they sit in an ice bucket rather than a fridge. - Meh... I don't drink pop so it's w/e to me.  They sell spicy lime Cheetos. It's like the best junk food ever. Spicy! Lime! Cheeto form! - Good.  Cashiers can be oblivious to customers in line, at times. - Mehhh.   This place is pretty big and is overall clean. - Great!

Reviews.Author: Eva
Reviews.Content: Really good job on the car washes, comfortable waiting area indoors or outside. They get my truck in & out quickly & do a great job. All the employees have always been super friendly & helpful!

Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Pit Stop #3  Horrible!  Beware!    Car wash tech ran my new car through the car wash with the window down.  The  Supervisor  all of about 17 years old offered me 2 free car washes for the  mistake .  I demanded to speak with manager- not available- spoke with assistant manager- all of about 17 years old- looked at me with a blank face as was fuming about what kind of idiot employee would send a car through with the window down.  I was extremely po'd that they had just hosed down the interior of my new car.  Complete interior of the car soaked with soapy water.  Filled out their  claim  form as they attempted to extract water from the car.  Tried for 3 days to get hold of the manager and district supervisor to find out what they were going to do about the damage.  One phone number goes straight to VM.  Other just rings and rings and rings.  Finally received a return call 3 days later to be informed that they accept NO RESPONSIBILITY and I am SOL.  Told me it is the customers responsibility to roll up the windows.  WOW  $1,500.00 in stereo equipment is now water damaged and glitching out.  Only time will tell what other electrical components are damaged.   THINK TWICE ABOUT TAKING YOUR CAR TO THESE CLOWNS.

Reviews.Author: Hope
Reviews.Content: After coming from 1700 miles away my car and truck were a mess, this place worked a miracle both inside and out on both vehicles. Thank you!!!

Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: For the love of you car, DO NOT GO HERE!!!  I HATE this place!!  I have been going for years and have had every car wash that they offer and EVERY SINGLE TIME I walk out completely disappointed.  They never clean the whole inside no matter which car wash you buy so I just started buying the cheap one because there is no value in the upgraded washes that they offer.  I always end up wiping down the inside of my own car at the car wash anyway.  Today I took my car in again and this time, they did not wipe down the inside at all (not just spots, they did not touch the inside), there was dust all over the dash and console and still drippings from some coffee that was spilled over.  They brought me my keys and when I walked up to the car, the outside of the car wasn't clean either.  The teenager actually gave us towels and we were cleaning our own car that we just paid to have cleaned.  We had driven out of town so there were some bugs on the front and when he gave us the keys, there were still bugs.  We pointed it out to him and he seemed lazy about trying to get them off even though we were able to wipe the car down clean.  They cleaned the wheels half assed and the windows were still dirty too.  I have had it with this place and will NEVER GO BACK!!!

Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: AVOID!!!!  Complete pain and crap customer service.  Purchased a car sun screen and was told keep the receipt to return if it did not fit.  It did not fit, I had the receipt and went to return it after work.  They wouldn't take the return because it is after 6 pm and they do not do any returns after 6pm.  Annoying, so I came back to return it on a Sunday around 5 pm.  I needed a car wash and decided to take care of both at the same time.  Went inside to return the car screen, and now told they cannot do the return because the manager is not there, left at 2 and they can't do any returns without the manager.  This is total BS!!  I cancelled the car wash, tipped the guy who got the vacuuming done in the time I was inside and left.  I wish I could leave a 0 on this review.  What a complete waste of time.  Too bad, when I first came here I thought it was great.  Edited to add the men who ran the car wash were understanding and professional when I cancelled the wash.

Reviews.Author: Mandy
Reviews.Content: Might be worth it for the cheapest wash. I paid for the most expensive and got basic service, no wax, no windows wiped, no seats wiped. I have been a long time customer, I won't ever go back again.

Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Shitty rude staff especially the overweight black woman whose attitude screams of I don't give a fuck. GO TO USA GAS ONE BLOCK NORTH IN THE ALBERTSONS PARKING LOT.   USA has the best prices and an ultra friendly staff!

Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: You know when you pay for the $27.99 wash and you watch your car sit there, yet the workers are bs'ing + chit chatting with each other and you realize they hardly cleaned the inside windows, the streaks are still there...that feeling? I remarked that it was very quick service and the worker said that they know the customers have to get going.  I can appreciate that, but don't make that your excuse for inferior service when you're specifically spending $27.99 for the extras and do t get those.  AVOID!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Nieves
Reviews.Content: One of the cleanest gas stations/convenient stores I go to!   Conveniently located on Stephanie and 215, aka between my work and home (always a plus)! I only use Chevron for my SUV, so I really can't say much on gas prices..  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯   I must try their car wash though! It looks busy everytime I'm there so they must be doing something right!

Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: They have good gas prices. Went there today to get my car washed. Needless to say, after an hour of waiting as I watched my car recieve very little attention and dry in the heat...for the $28 service, I was told my car was finished. This was the crapiest car wash I have ever had...except for thise held by highschool students at fundraisers. When I pointed out that my wheels were still dirty, I was told it was because of the tire dressing. When I pointed out the bird poop on the roof, the manager was standing next to me...offered no solution. He seemed more concerned about coming up with BS explanations than remedies. The interior had barely been touched. This place showed no signs of having the desire to make things right. There wasn't even an offer to have it sent through the wash again. After I requested a refund, the manager didn't even try to appologize.  I WILL NOT go back, not for gas, and not for any merchandise.  I will either go to Terrible's on Pecos or to the Shell Station on Flamingo. I don't need the headache.

Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: I like to bring the car here to get a wash.  I also like Chevron gas so I like this place.  1.  Car wash - priced like all others, you know for the full service it will be 17.99.  They have cheaper ones, yet they only do the basic for the cheaper ones.  I like everyone that does it. You can tell that when the car is turned over to you, a manager or supervisor has been the final person in the car.  They do a great job except never for the front windows.  They spend time on it, however, I think the chemical they use or the towels leave a smear that after a few hours goes from being totally clean to totally smeared. I always have to wipe it again.  2.  The soda's - Great priced soda and huge fountain service. You can get almost any soda you want here.  3.  Small Sandwich Shop - never ordered one from here, but the smell is wonderful.  4.  Clean bathrooms - Need I say more.  5.  Nice wait room - Clean, TV, plenty of space.  Check it out.

Reviews.Author: Kalynn
Reviews.Content: I go to this Chevron almost three times a week because I work in the same parking lot and it's very convenient. Tonight, after getting off work, my boyfriend and I stop by to get gas, but before I get out of my vehicle I collect all the trash in it and throw it away. Two bottles of Aquafina, and a can of brisk ice tea, and some Starbucks wrappers. I stay at the pump, use my debit card and get my gas. As I'm trying to get in my vehicle to leave with my boyfriend, a woman from the store comes out and starts asking me why I had so many bottles and what they were. She never gave me a reason as to why she was accusing me of stealing when I NEVER STEPPED FOOT IN THE STORE TO BEGIN WITH, but I proceeded to get everything I threw away, back out of the trash. I showed her my hot water bottles and my empty can, but that didn't satisfy her. She told us she couldn't prove that I did anything, but what was there to prove?? Until she is gone, or extremely retrained to treat customers better and with RESPECT, I will never go there again. 7-11 will have my business from now on. I can't believe I was harassed at the pump for stealing bottles when I never stepped foot in the establishment.

Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: Today I made the mistake of taking my car to this car wash. Don't stop here just keep driving. the attendant made the mistake of writing the time I arrived on the ticket 11:35 what time did I leave 12:30 really? 55 minutes.  Ok so I got a really good wash right? Hahaha hell to the NO!!! Worst car wash ever!! Let your kids do it they'll do a better job. Dirt still on my hub caps ugh. Never again. Wish I would have read these other horrendous reviews before I stopped.  Terrible's on windmill and Pecos puts this place to shame.

Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Used to get free air for the tires. You would go inside and they give you 2 tokens for free air. Not no more bring your quarters. 50 cents for air and no gauge to show you the pressure.

Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: Easy access from Soutbound Stephanie, uncrowded gas pumps, a clean store, and service with a smile. Gas prices ain't the lowest but they don't fleece you either. In short...it's a good place to get your gas and other c-store things you might need.   (I need to try their car wash next time!)

Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: Buy 10 get 1 free car wash PLUS Early Bird Special(7am-9am) with $2.00OFF

Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: Really disappointed in car wash and wax. For my $50 I expected the interior to have been dusted if not wiped down. Had paid the extra for the wax. Only time will tell if it was worth it. I have got to quit tipping. I gave a $10 tip. Wasn't worth it. I'll check back and let you know how the wax holds up. Nice interior and exterior. Full service gas station and convenience store.

Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Pit Stop car wash used to be excellent, but in recent times they have gone downhill- and fast. I have had several bad experiences in the last 6 months, but I decided to give them one last shot a few days ago. And it was another bad car wash. The team rushes me to hurry up and get out of my car, once inside- poor customer service, and then once I get my vehicle back- the wash was awful. I will not be back, no matter how convenient the location to my home.

Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: The inside of my car wasnt vacuumed the way it should be, my boyfriend had to ask for a towel so he can wipe down finger prints on the front of my car and on the windows as well, black stains on the inside werent wiped down, although it was only $18.99 its not worth to spend your money on something you can do yourself for free. It could be that is all young kids working including girls, everyone seems tired and without a drop of energy, definitely need to get a better staff thats full of energy and could clean cars the correct way. All in all i will never come back to this car wash if it means im only throwing my money in the trash.   Also the african american woman that was the register was extremely rude. Yelling saying   I SAID HELLO  After i had smiled at her, right after i told her   i smiled at you  she put her hands up and said   OHHHH BIG DEALLLL  not sure what that was about i laughed at the confusion

Reviews.Author: Row
Reviews.Content: The BEST car detailing spot. My car is 10 years and looked brand new once the finished. I will be bring my car to this place all the time, even though I live in the other side of town in the Southwest. WORTH IT!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: Went for a car wash at 7am on 6/29/14, was not given the early bird special as advertised online and on receipt. Also, no coffee was offered as part of the advertised promotion online. I was the 5th car in line and it took about an hour for them to clean my car. After they ran my car through the car wash, my car sat for at least 15-20 minutes before someone finally started cleaning it. I use to come here often and the service has gone from good to poor service! After this and previous similar experience my wife had with the car wash, I will not come back here again!   I would recommend Seven Hills Car Wash on Eastern and Sunridge Heights. They do a fantastic job and they also offer happy hour on Sunday and Mondays 8a-9a and 3p-4p. Definitely worth the wait!!!

Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: I had driven from Florida, through New Mexico, Arizona, and other dusty states inbetween.  My car was SO dirty, you couldn't even tell what color it was anymore.  I was staying at the hotel across the street, and saw this car wash out my window.  I saw how the kids working there hustled and were doing such a good job.  The next morning, I pulled in and got the cheapest car wash they offered.  They do everything from wash, to wax, to interior, etc.  But, it was a rental car and I only wanted the exterior washed (had it been my car, I would have gone for the works).  The guys sprayed something on my wheels, and I went through the machine.  When I came out the other side, more workers were waiting to wipe down any water still on my car.  They have an awesome assembly line there.  I couldn't believe it was the same car.   After this great washing, I think the car even ran better.  Excellent place with hard-working kids.  I was SO glad I saw them out my window - I like a clean car.  The basic wash was really cheap - and WELL worth it.

Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: I used to come here all the time. There were older hispanic men finishing up the cars after they went thru the automatic car wash. I never had any issues and you can see they really took their time. Things have changed! Now they have all these lazy teenagers finishing up the cars and they're a complete joke. I'm not saying teenagers can't handle working, but at least management should watch them to ensure they're actually doing something. This girl took like 10 minutes tops, and said she  couldn't wait to be done for the day.  When I went to my car, there were so many areas needed to be wiped down, the mats were backwards and there was visible dust. I don't think i'll be going back. Too bad.

Reviews.Author: Rose
Reviews.Content: The worst car wash I have ever had. I figured I would try this place out and it was truly a big mistake. They did vacuum the car thoroughly, there is still stains and gunks that have not been wiped. I usually wouldn't mind a little here and there, but this place just did nothing. There is still dust inside my car...It seems like they just wipe it down a little bit with a dry rag and say they r done because i only waited about 15 minutes for my car to be finished. No good customer service as well. There is one young hispanic girl who works as a cashier that never smiles, says hello, or ask what u would like. One time I went in and saw her. She never aaid hi and just looked at me. I looked at her and waited for her say something, but nope. She was the first reason why I didnt like going to this place, but now I definitely have another reason why I should not go here....If I could give a zero, I would. Please do not go here for a car wash. It is not worth your money and time. If u r paying with ur own money, u deserve more than just a stare and horrible customer service..

Reviews.Author: Franz
Reviews.Content: Amazing detail service for $24, good gas price, clean facilities and excellent customer service!

Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: The guys at the car wash work so hard and do such a great job I end up over-tipping each time I get my car washed.  I'll do the quick wash (outside only) and stay in the car as it passes through.  I haven't encountered anyone who doesn't  bring it .  Good job.

Reviews.Author: Marty
Reviews.Content: Was forced to go there yesterday (because my daughter drove it so much, the gas gauge didn't even move when I started it). I hate that low fuel light!  Well, guess what? Once again, no receipt at the pump. What a surprise!

Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I stopped in for a quick car wash. Luis ran over and removed my antenna as I was entering, saving my antenna from damage and my antenna ball..  That's going above and beyond!

Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: Are you joking me? Never go here $20 car wash! I've had my car washed better at a drive thru self wash. There was no full service here just a full service rip off.

Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: If I could give 0 Stars I would. I've tried this place three times with no luck and only a dirty car and frustration to show for it. The first time I went I expected for them to actually clean the inside. After 45 minutes of waiting, I get the car back and to my surprise the cup holders are dirty. The gearshift, the doors, the back windshield, and my rearview  mirrors were untouched and dirty. I asked the attendant if there's a reason that these things weren't done. He looks at me confused and says I don't know what you mean. I was in a rush so I just left. I called to ask how I could  my money back after spending over $20 for a car wash and my car was still dirty. The staff told me that they could not refund my money but I could take my car back and they would fix it. I took the car back  a second time and it still looked the same as the first time. Weeks ago I was in a pinch and since it's a block away from my house I figured I'd give them a try again. Big mistake!!! They didn't clean the cup holders they didn't clean the back windshield they didn't clean the gear shift they did not dust off the controls, etc. Another $20 wasted. If you want a good car wash go to Country Club on Eastern and Serene... They are the best!

Reviews.Author: Bethany
Reviews.Content: Since this place is conveniently located near me, it's an easy place to take my car to get clean.  The girls at the counter are usually pretty pleasant.  They issued me a punch card so after my 10 visits, I get one free!  Love it!   I was never really sure of the proper procedure but I would go in to pay first.  Then I just drive my car to the 'starting line'.  The gentlemen usually working there are very gracious and quick about coming over to greet me.  From there it's about a 5-10 minute wait for completion.  There are plenty of seats to wait either inside or out to watch the finishing touches.  After it goes through the wash, they thoroughly dry it off and dust the entire inside.  Every time my car is perfect again with not a speck of dirt or water spot.  They have done an amazing job with every visit and I am a happy girl.    My tip ~ Early bird discount on car washes done between 7 - 9 am.  $2 off

Reviews.Author: Vegas
Reviews.Content: Convenience is the word. It's close to the freeway, Chevron gas fair prices but not the low price guys, really good variety of last moment stuff and pretty good car wash with varied levels of service. Store is clean and well lit in and outside. Feels safe even middle of the night. Been here many times and I recommend for variety and safety reasons I pretty much use this store when out late. Good store.

Reviews.Author: Ted
Reviews.Content: Is this the BEST car wash spot ever??? No, but for the price and convenience it is well worth it. This location is one block from my apartment so it makes life less difficult.   The highest tier for EXTERIOR ONLY wash cost me $11. I also opted $15 for an exterior hand waxing/buffing.   My car needed a wash badly. I had just driven from San Francisco area to Las Vegas, then Las Vegas to SoCal, then SoCal to Las Vegas. My car looked like it had just been through Operation Desert Storm. In addition, my car looked like a mass grave for bugs and it had been caked on by the unforgiving Las Vegas heat.   I didn't expect much from this wash because lets face it... its a gas station car wash. After going through the machine car wash, a team of workers went to town on my car. They wiped down every nook and cranny of my car. I saw one of the techs really working hard to get all the caked on brake dust off my wheels. Then one of the guys went at it with a buffing machine and some wax. They waxed the roof and wiped down some of the interior panels... even though I only paid for an exterior wash.   When I got the car back it was squeaky clean. It had a mirror like finish and the paint felt smooooth. I will definitely come back again whenever I need a wash.

Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: This was my first experience at the Pit Stop. I needed to get the wifes car a nice scrub down after leaving the gym and they were conveniently located right there.The wash will run you right around 20 bucks for something decent, that includes a free air freshner (alright pina colada). They TAKE THEIR TIME washing your ride here which can either be a good or a bad thing. That depends on your schedule.  The waiting area has 2 large flat screen tv's. They were rocking the food network and a camera showing your car going through the wash process.  The wash was pretty good but for me it wasnt worth the wait. By the time i got my car back i had bee there for over an hour. Im not sure if thats a normal ordeal for them or what. But ill stick to my normal places and will probably never drive back to the PIT STOP unless i have time to spare.  Oh yeah before I forget if anyone is looking for a Job they are hiring here so please inquire within :) not sure what positions are available but they are hiring.

Reviews.Author: Karina
Reviews.Content: Came this morning to get a quick car wash before work. I disconnected my phone charger and ipod nano for easier cleaning and put everything in my clean and empty trunk. Once they were finished cleaning my car, I noticed that my ipod nano was missing. I tried talking to the manager but she was  too busy  in a meeting to come out and help out with the situation. She just told the supervisor to tell me that they're not  responsible for belongings inside the car  even though I had JUST disconnected it for them to clean the inside of my car. Nobody seems to have it of course, so even though it's a minor thing, I called the local police to see if we can find the person responsible for that. HORRIBLE customer service. It's the LAST time I'll ever be back here. I don't recommend it to anybody. Very dishonest staff.

Reviews.Author: Mr.
Reviews.Content: Review for car wash. . I usually only get gas here and something to drink. I will not get my jeep washed here again after the horrible service and the long wait to get it washed. It took 1 hour for the whole process. And I was only the 5th car in line right when they opened. After it was  washed  There was still dirt and water spots all over. I asked for my keys and took a trip down to terribles and got a full service detail with wax for 10 dollars more then what they charge me. I won't have any more car washes here. .
